item.title: Nginx Keepalived (HA) 設定
item.description: 本篇筆記參考: NGINX Document-High Availability Support Based on keepalived [sysctl]CentLinux-keepalived: Configure Floating IP in CentOS 7 Servers nixCraft-Verify: Keepalived IP Failover Working Or Not With tcpdump Command man keepalived.conf Keepalived 是一套由 C 語言撰寫的路由軟體 (Routing software)，主要目的是提供 Linux 設施
